name: The Free Writer: Director’s cut
description:
-Description:

"The Free Writer: Director’s cut" is an extended version of our game 
"The Free Writer"

-Story:

The Free Writer is a horror game where you take the role of Mark Wenzel a very famous writer who's his wife went missing a day after there one year anniversary.

-Contact:

If you have any idea, suggestion or criticism send them at the0warrior.b@gmail.com
or write them in the comment section.
